name: Skeleguns
description:
Skeleguns is a skelefun local PvP game where each player's goal is to defeat their enemy using a gun and catching different power-ups. 

Each power-up is physics based: the blue and green make it possible to change gravity's strength, while  the yellow and red ones push and pull the enemy. 

This way the player's can only kill each other indirectly, by trying to force them into danger.

This game was developed in 40h for MAD Game Jam.

Also make sure to check out Inês' portfolio!
